Package index

Obtain Met Data

View Metadata

Read and visualise meta data relating to meteorological measurement sites.

getMeta()
Find a ISD site code and other meta data
getMetaLive()
Obtain site meta data from NOAA server
weatherCodes
Codes for weather types

Import Met Data

Directly import NOAA meteorological data.

importNOAA()
Import Meteorological data from the NOAA Integrated Surface Database (ISD)

ADMS

Functions relating to the Atmospheric Dispersion Modelling System.

exportADMS()
Export a meteorological data frame in ADMS format
